content: Christian Urban | King's College London Skip to main contentDr Christian Urban Lecturer in Computer ScienceMSc Programme Board ChairEmmy-Noether Fellow of the German Research CouncilResearch interestsComputer scienceContact details+44 020 7848 2584christian.urban@kcl.ac.ukBiographyChristian Urban is a Lecturer in Computer Science, in the department of Informatics at King's College London. He received his Master's degree from the University of St Andrews and completed his PhD at Cambridge University, funded by two scholarships from the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD). Before joining King's, he was awarded a Junior Research Fellowship at Corpus Christi College in Cambridge, and a five-year Emmy-Noether fellowship, which he held at the TU Munich, Germany.
